itunes:title: Betting Our Bank Account In Vegas
title: Betting Our Bank Account In Vegas
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
The boys bet their bank account in Las Vegas, is the theory of Thursdayism a real thing, and a repo show is faked. Plus the boys try to visit a strip show and another person poops in Ilya's private bathroom.


Make sure to follow us @lightweightspod on insta and tell us who to have on next!
